title: x/text/encoding/charmap: add aditional codepages
body:
add more codepages from
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/goglobal/bb964653
to
golang.org/x/text/encoding/charmap

my discrete interest is in OEM 852
maybe it's possible to grab it via the maketables.go script

i havnt found a valid MIB, but maybe there
golang.org/x/text/text/encoding/internal/identifier/mib.go
need to be one added too.
